dialogue.text: A-aaachoo!!!
You hanging in there, Spicy?
*sniffle sniffle* Blehhh… S-so cold…
We'll be back at my place soon enough. I'll have specialty tea brewing as soon as we're back. Should warm you right up.
Man... Togarashi Town is always so nice and warm during every other season… so why does it get so darn cold in the winter? I don't get it…
I'm no expert on weather, but… when I was younger, I used to wonder the same thing.
My mother had a story she'd tell me about this place. Ever since the town was built, it was watched over by two ancient beasts...
A fox of smoldering fire who controlled the heat... and a dragon of ice who ruled the cold.
The Weather Beasts, as they were called, were fiercely competitive, always trying to prove who's domain was the strongest, a constant push and pull aided by the changing of seasons.
Can those Weather Beasts take their competition somewhere else? Better yet, I want a word with this Ice Dragon! I need them to chill the heck out with all the snow and shivers!
As nice as warmer weather would be, creatures of legend like that don't make their presence known to humans.
…are you sure about that?
…yes?
Smoki-doki! Look! Right by the gate!
That tail… those horns… that shade of blue! It's gotta be!
Hey, you! Hold the heck up!
…are you talking to me?
Yeah, you! The mythical Ice Dragon of legend, live in person! It's challenge time! No backsies!
If I win, you have to back down and let it be sunny all year!
Oh? Well… I wouldn't exactly call myself 'mythical' or 'a legend'.
I'm also not from here. I've just been taking a little vacation from my home city, is all. I think you got the wrong guy, eheh-
Though, what's this about a challenge? Are you trying to, like, fight me or something?
Not that kind of fighting! A music fight!
Oh! I guess sudden music battles are common here, too.
Y'know, I could go for some singing right about now, even if I can't help with your weather problem.
Hmm… I wouldn't mind joining for a quick bout. You think you'll be ok in the cold for a little longer, Spicy?
I'm all fired up now! No snow is gonna stop me from making this happen!
I bet if that Weather Beast saw us win against another dragon, they'll get all scared and go runnin' away!
Let's do this, Ice Dragon of… where are you from?
Brooklyn.
…of Brooklyn! Huh, never heard of a place like that.
